First step Select bet Players can choose to bet on the game. The more bets, the higher the winning rate. Second step Fairness algorithm BlockGuess algorithm is open source, and players can access the random.org and BCH block browser query validation. Third step Receive a prize easily After the player wins the prize, the bonus is automatically issued to the player account. Welcome Back! Sign in continue to BlockGuess! Forgot Password? Commission according to a certain ratio of invitee user betting amounts is refunded to the inviter by the platform once the invitee user betting a transaction successfully. Partner specification 1.After invitee registering successfully, commission discount is generated correspondingly while emerging a true betting.
 2.Commission discount is sent to your account by means of BCH.
 3.Commission discount proportion is 1% of betting amounts by user.
 4.Settlement method: settling at UTC 8:00 every weekend.
 5.Commission less than 0.0001BCH delaying payment accumulates to the next period.
 6.Unlimited commission restitution.
